channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Big Picture: Why the Skubal-Tigers Salary Standoff Could Make MLB History
item.description: The Tigers ace wants $32 million but the team offered $19 million. Here's why that $13 million gap represents a monumental moment.

item.title: NCAA Denies Ole Miss QB Trinidad Chambliss a 6th Year of Eligibility
item.description: The NCAA has officially denied Ole Miss and Trinidad Chambliss' petition for a sixth year of eligibility, and explained the why of the decision.

item.title: 2026 MLB Free Agent Signings, Trades: Dodgers Add an Infielder
item.description: Keeping tabs on all of MLB's notable free agency signings, trades, and extensions ahead of the 2026 season.

item.title: Former Phillies, Twins OF Max Kepler Suspended 80 Games for Banned PED Violation
item.description: Former Phillies and Twins outfielder Max Kepler faces an 80-game suspension for a positive drug test violation.

item.description: Our panel of fantasy basketball experts lists their biggest surprises and disappointments so far this season.

item.title: Chargers RB Hampton plans to return vs. Patriots

item.title: Ole Miss' Chambliss has waiver denied by NCAA
item.description: The NCAA has denied Ole Miss quarterback Trinidad Chambliss' waiver for sixth year of eligibility, the NCAA announced Friday afternoon.
